TextLang.Text: A connection error has occurred. The WLAN switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
A connection error has occurred. The WIRELESS switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
A connection error has occurred. You have been disconnected from the network.
A connection error has occurred. The image transfer timed out.
A connection error has occurred. The image transfer timed out.
The PSP™ you selected is not connected to the network.
